articles.author: Ryan Divish
articles.title: At long last, you can call Mariners the American League West champs - The Seattle Times
articles.description: For the first time in 24 years, the Mariners are AL West champions. The party is on after the Mariners cruised to a 9-1 win over the Rockies with two historic homers for Cal Raleigh.
articles.content:
Season after season, they could only watch as someone else took their turn atop a place that seemed to grow farther away with each passing year.
When the 2001 Mariners ran away with the American Lea… [+6878 chars]
